alert.note: Alert for Iowa; Jefferson; Johnson; Keokuk; Washington (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 04 at 7:38AM CDT until April 04 at 8:15AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Quad Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Keokuk County in southeastern Iowa... Southwestern Johnson County in east central Iowa... Northwestern Washington County in southeastern Iowa... Northwestern Jefferson County in southeastern Iowa... Southeastern Iowa County in east central Iowa... * Until 815 AM CDT. * At 738 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Ollie, or 12 miles north of Fairfield, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Rubio and Lake Darling State Park around 745 AM CDT. Talleyrand around 750 AM CDT. Keota and Washington County Fairgrounds around 755 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include West Chester, Wellman, Richmond, Amish and Kalona. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building.
